name: TAN[X]
description:
Tank based party game!
Fight enemy tanks in a head to head series of mini-games but with an awkward twist... you're all in the dark!

Remember the trajectories of missiles as they disappear off into the darkness; do whatever it takes to be the last tank standing!

Supports mixed Local + Online multiplayer

20 maps, 3 gamemodes, 11 modifiers

+some super dumb bots, but we don't have to talk about them ;)

This game was developed in around a month for a game jam, so sorry if it's a bit rough around the edges ;3
